docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Challenges a political party face
docs.text:
1. Lack of internal democracy

  2. Consentration of power in one hand -Make it so that for every choice the party makes, there will be a voting process

  3. Not-so-inflesivive people have no power to say open up more opportunities for low-level ppl of the party to rise up in power

  4. No membership registers Make a law so that all members of the party are recorded in a register

  5. Dynastic succssion Make it so that the party members have an internal election

  6. Money and Muscle power

  7. No meaningful choice to the voters

docs.title: Important dates
docs.text:
1707 Act of union bettween england and scotland

1789 French revolution

1807 Giuseppe Mazzini founded Young Italy and Young Europe

1815 Vienna convention

1821 The struggle of the Greek for their indenpendance began

1832 Treaty of Constantinople

1848 Fredric prepared a series of 4 paintings

1871 The Prussian King William the first was proclaimed the german emperor

1909 Hindi Swaraj

1915 Mahatma Gandi came back to India (from Africa)

1917 Satiya Graha in Gujarat

1918 Ahmedabad mill strike

1919 (A lot of shit happend, here is the list)

  • Rowlatt Act
  • Jallianwala Bagh Massicre

1920 Non corpration moment

1921 Khilafat Movement

1929 Purna Swaraj

12/3/1930 Dandi march start

24/9/1932 Puna Pact
